directions: Place ground beef, onion, and garlic in a lightly greased Dutch oven. Cook over medium heat until ground beef is browned, breaking it apart with a wooden spoon as it cooks.
Add chili powder, tomatoes, and beef broth and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add Knorr(R) Rice and corn and cook another 7 minutes.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon chipotle chile powder, or more to taste
1 (28 ounce) can no-salt crushed tomatoes in puree
1 (5.4 ounce) package Knorr® Fiesta Sides™ - Mexican Rice
title: Chipotle Chili with Rice
